description: This file defines the SlackAPI class, which extends BaseAPIApp and provides methods to retrieve synchronous and asynchronous routers for Slack integration.

classes.name: SlackAPI
classes.description: A class representing the Slack API integration, providing methods to obtain API routers.

methods.name: get_router
methods.description: Returns the synchronous router for Slack, configured with the current agent and team.

methods.name: get_async_router
methods.description: Returns the asynchronous router for Slack, configured with the current agent and team.
